Plot: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British country gentry.
Title: Angels and Insects
Writer: A.S. Byatt (novel), Belinda Haas (screenplay), Philip Haas (screenplay)
Actors: Mark Rylance, Kristin Scott Thomas, Patsy Kensit, Jeremy Kemp
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
